## hpr0911 :: Hobbies

 
A show about the hobbies I've had over the years


The Secret Life of machines videos by Tim Hunkin, originally broadcasted in the UK in around 1980
https://www.exploratorium.edu/ronh/SLOM/


Ohms Law 
https://people.usd.edu/~schieber/psyc770/resistors/ohms4beginner.html


Information about the thermionic valve 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vacuum_tube


Calculating Wavelength
https://www.ewart.org.uk/physics/index.php?l=44


Small Yaseu FT 817, Multi Mode Hf, VHF and UHF transceiver
https://www.g4ilo.com/ft817.html 19:00


Base Station Kenwood TS 940S, Multi Mode Hf Transceiver
https://www.universal-radio.com/catalog/hamhf/ts940s.html 19:00


Amiga 500 Computer
https://www.obsoletecomputermuseum.org/amiga500/


Beginning Ubuntu Linux from novice to professional 
https://www.amazon.com/Beginning-Ubuntu-Linux-Novice-Professional/dp/1590596277


Linux Pocket guide 
https://www.amazon.com/Linux-Pocket-Guide-Daniel-Barrett/dp/0596006284/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1327077298&sr=1-1


Wicked cool shell scripts 
https://nostarch.com/wcss.htm


Raspberry PI, micro Computer for $35 
https://www.raspberrypi.org
